component.name: SimpleTask
component.script:
sub init() m.top.functionName = "executeTask" end sub
function executeTask() as void print m.top.button if (m.top.button < 3) buttonStrings = ["smart_plug_on", "smart_plug_off", "smart_plug_toggle"] IFTTT_KEY = "dc1DypXeiKODXb7XG3-56t" urlString = Substitute("http://maker.ifttt.com/trigger/{0}/with/key/{1}", buttonStrings[m.top.button], IFTTT_KEY) print urlString request = CreateObject("roUrlTransfer") request.SetUrl(urlString) html = request.GetToString() print html m.top.index = m.top.index + 1 else print "open settings" end if end function
